speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Steve from XYZ Collections. How the hell are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How can I help you today?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your overdue account. Can you just confirm your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, now let's get to the point. You owe us a shitload of money. What are you doing about it?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m currently looking for a job and I will make a payment as soon as I can.

speaker: Agent
text: You think that’s a good excuse? This is f***ing ridiculous! You need to step up.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand that the situation is serious, and I'm trying to manage it.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever. Just get your act together and pay what you owe. It’s not rocket science!

speaker: Customer
text: I will do my best to resolve this as soon as possible.

speaker: Agent
text: You better. Or, trust me, I’ll be back on your ass with more calls!

speaker: Customer
text: I look forward to resolving this amicably. Thank you for your call.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, whatever. Good luck with that!
